thread.title: In Pics: Pro-Turkey Protesters Riot in Rotterdam and Istanbul
thread.title_full: In Pics: Pro-Turkey Protesters Riot in Rotterdam and Istanbul

author: Jack Montgomery
title: In Pics: Pro-Turkey Protesters Riot in Rotterdam and Istanbul
text: Hundreds of Turkish migrants and dual nationals turned out onto the streets of Rotterdam to riot in support of their home countryâ€™s Islamist president last night, forcing Dutch police to take robust action to disperse them.   People wave Turkish national flags during a demonstration near the Turkish consulate in Rotterdam on March 11, 2017. Photo: MARTEN VAN DIJL/AFP/Getty Images Turkish residents of the Netherlands gather for a protest in Rotterdam on March 11, 2017. Photo: EMMANUEL DUNAND/AFP/Getty Images Geert Wilders, leader of the Party for Freedom (PVV), released a message in response to the unrest, telling rioters, â€œYou are no Europeans, and you will never be.â€ ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· Geert Wilders's message to Turks: "You are not welcome here!" #Turkey #Rotterdam pic.twitter.com/NEIPKkSgsv â€” Keith Walker (@KeithWalkerNews) March 12, 2017 â€œAn Islamic state like Turkey does not belong to Europe. All the values Europe stands for â€“ freedom, democracy, human rights â€“ are incompatible with Islam,â€ he said. â€œTurkey voted for ErdoÄŸan, a dangerous Islamist who raises the flag of Islam. We do not want more, but less Islam. So Turkey, stay away from us. You are not welcome here.â€ Aggressive crowds have gathered outside the Dutch embassy in Ankara and the consulate in
